Package board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a representation of the board and functions to manipulate it

      • placePlayer

        public BoardEntity placePlayer​(int x,
                               int y,
                               Player player)
        Sets the players position on the Board

        Note: Recursively pushes players in appropriate direction

        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of target location
        y - y coordinate of target location
        player - player to push
        Returns:
        BoardEntity the player is now on top of
